name: Ball Drop (alexandrepepin, jerome.lavoie.01)
description:
GameDev Insiders Jam #1 Submission

The ball must move to survive! If it stops, you die !

Use the mouse to move the obstacle and direct the ball through the course.

Pick-ups description: 

+ Speed up

- Speed down

<< Spin left

>> Spin right

The game only contains 8 relatively hard levels

Let us know it the comments if you were able to beat the game!
